scripts.prepare: npm run clean && make update-contract && npm run build
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish && git add . && git commit -m "release: $(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish && git add . && git commit -m "release: $(cat package.json | jq -r '.version')"
